name: EresumeX
description: Resume & Job Portal with EX factors
overview: Eresumex is a company that was set up to provide exclusive access to search a global resume portal for no cost to its users. Focused on the recruiting market EresumeX provides tools and resources that will aid in the job placement process. Recruiters are rewarded with enhanced tools as they collaborate and integrate their recruiting assets with the resume portal and they are encouraged to upload resumes. In turn this multi-pronged approach gives a powerful tool for job seekers to create a road to employment with minimal obstacles and gives the employer faster access to the right candidates.
